summary:
A commercial and creative professional with extensive experience delivering international business development and retail expertise, demonstrating the entrepreneurial spirit and consumer insight to drive turnover and margin maximization through strategic collaboration, commercialization, category and brand positioning 

With the commercial acumen and proven track record of leveraging FMCG products at international retailers, opportunities and teams to augment strategic vision and objectives, this passionate and customer focused leader establishes sustainable infrastructure and partnerships to deliver beneficial relations and profitable returns

An influential professional who facilitates creative problem-solving to market challenges and best practice in international environments, supported by transferrable technical, communication, presentation and negotiation skills to deliver long term business planning and strategy to add value to organizations.

►Value Creation - Builds value and best practice by combining creative and commercial insights

►Business Development - Innovative identification and commercialization of new business opportunities

►Licensing Excellence - Mastering strategic value, tactical instruments and practicalities of licensing

►Product Development - Creates and markets new products and concepts, supporting the full life cycle 

►People Management - Inspires and motivates cross functional teams to deliver strategic vision

►Strategic Consulting - Defines and directs implementation of innovative and successful strategies 

►Strategic Partnerships - Cultivates strong partnerships with all key clients, partners and stakeholders

►Project Management - Proven ability to deliver projects on time and to budget

Contact detailst:
☎ +31 650 550 375
⌨ davey@daveybackx.nl

profile_positions.description:
Smeldt sets the standard for luxury scented candles, with innovative designs that reflect and applaud humanity's diversity.

Smeldt uses 10 carat-gold in its designs and the candles are hand-poured traditionally in the Netherlands. Each vase is made of the highest EU-quality porselain and every vase is not perfectly round and therefore unique in shape. A very exclusive scent is created especially for Smeldt by Master Perfumer Christophe Laudamiel in NYC. Every candle comes with an exclusive handmade giftbox manufactured by the Purveyor of the Royal Queen of the Netherlands.

Having a rainbow family myself; being married to my husband and having two sons, it is my personal mission to improve the situation and rights of others in the LGBT+ community. To join forces and create impact, Smeldt is proudly partnering with the All Out Foundation. 

For more information and inquiries:

www.smeldt.com
davey@smeldt.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/smeldt/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/smeldt
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner of Smeldt
Director Licensing & Retail Consumer Products Benelux and Nordics

profile_positions.description:
Paramount Global is home to some of the world's premier entertainment brands, which connect with our audiences through compelling content across television, motion picture, online and mobile platforms in over 160 countries and territories. With media networks reaching approximately 700 million global subscribers, Paramount's leading brands include Nickelodeon, MTV, Comedy Central, VH1, CMT, Logo, BET, Nickelodeon, Paramount Pictures, among others. 

► Managing direct, experiential and content CP (Consumer Products) opportunities across all markets
► Managing all in- and external stakeholders to ensure the best possible outcome for all involved (CPLG, licensees, retailers, C-suite, adsales, program sales, channel marketing, PR, digital and creative amongst others)

Managing Paramount retail and e-tail activities the Benelux, Nordics and CEE
► Plan, develop and implement local retail strategy in close collaboration with CPLG and build strategic partnerships with key retailers in the region
► Develop, implement and manage local retail initiatives for all priority brands
► Work with retailers on measurable ROI

Key Achievements
✔	Developed a profitable line of business  with leading cinema chains throughout Europe 
✔	Broadened and deepened the partnerships with master toy partners like Mattel, Hasbro and Spin Master resulting in increased sell through
✔	Localized and marketed the PAW Patrol mini live show in Denmark, Poland, the Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Sr. Licensing & Retail Manager Consumer Products CEE, Benelux & Nordics

company.name: Hoomark B.V., part of International Greetings LTD

profile_positions.description:
Hoomark BV is a 100% daughter of stock-listed company International Greetings Ltd, with a yearly turnover of €250M, producing articles (home brands, private label and licensed) in the gift-packaging and stationery category distributed to major blue chip retailers in mainland Europe.

Retail & Business Development Manager Europe :

Providing direction of the retail and business development strategy and translating this strategy into commercial propositions for existing and new clients in order to optimize turnover and margin

► Leading business development projects for key accounts and prospects such as Toys“R’Us, Carrefour, Auchan, Lidl, REWE, Albert Heijn, Kruidvat and Action

► Building bridges between sales and clients internationally through engagement and collaboration

► Perfecting marketing mix (product/price/promotions) to deadlines to optimize product success, turnover and margin

► Managing the PD department (7 FTE) through inspirational leadership, guidance and engagement

► Travelling extensively around the world to build strategic partnerships and leverage opportunities; clients, suppliers, sister companies, licensors and fairs

Key Achievements

✔ Developed business for existing clients by identifying opportunities, planning approaches and pitches; new product introductions at Auchan and Action

✔ Developed business for new clients by identifying opportunities, planning approaches and pitches; product listings at Lidl and Carrefour

✔ Professionalising NPD process, reorganizing the marketing department and introducing cross functional teams, improving product and marketing concepts, improving company presentations
profile_positions.title: Retail & Business Development Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Managed the marketing department with 7 FTEs and the product category, focusing on product development and ROS, transforming customer guidelines into a category strategy realized through product and POS concepts

► Management of the product portfolio; home brands, private labels and brand licensing

► Managed a 10+ license portfolio including Walt Disney, Sanrio, Mattel, Universal and Lucas Film

► Introduced and optimized sales and marketing tools like brochures, sample books and fair activities

Key Achievements

✔ Contributed to >35% turnover growth in a highly competitive market with effective category and product management

✔ Optimized ROS of the licensed product portfolio managing licensors like Walt Disney, Sanrio and Mattel

✔ Delivered an increase of product output and ROI optimization of investment

✔ Optimized stock levels
profile_positions.title: Category Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Established and launched a new company with creative products, leading commercialisation and strategy, defining and managing creative/marketing concepts, based on international trend forecasts

►Identified, initiated and created new product / market combinations with associated strategies; drove creation of collections, website, exhibition stand, art work and all other marketing materials; analysed and performance managed market trends and developments to maintain competitive edge; led negotiations with current and new suppliers on terms, quality, delivery times and prices

Key Achievements

✔Created and managed brand / marketing tools (print, digital, media) and strategies to sales agents

✔Handled private labels for key customers in partnership with sales / printing & packaging manufacturers

✔Project managed international fairs from planning, budgeting and resource management
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Provided project, product and design management services for international organizations, including:

►Burg China Connections - managed visual merchandising, product development and showrooom styling for key customers, travelling to China and Hong Kong

►VVV Zuid Limburg - Concept development, art direction, project management and product development for the retail formula ‘the Limburg Store’ and the retail formula ‘Tourist Service Desks’.

►Brova Group - Concept development/project management of entrance hall and canteen restyling 

►Studio Fred de Vries - Concept development, art direction and project management of showroom restyling and visual merchandising (800m2)

►Boca Candles / VNK - Art direction, desig and management of exhibition booth, marketing material and product collections, responsibility also for the concept and management of new packaging
profile_positions.title: Freelance Product & Interior Designer

profile_positions.description:
Designed a broad range of interior solutions for clients of Kok Wooncenter (11.000m2), translating clients’ needs and requirements in a three-dimensional styling plan initiating the sales process

►Developed a dynamic styling studio/office in which clients were invited into their virtual living room

►Coordinated and styled the windows, the shelves plans and special promotions
profile_positions.title: Interior Stylist

profile_positions.location: Hong Kong, New Zealand, Bali and Australia
profile_positions.title: Travelling
